title: Sosio App
description: The Stakeholder Management Application is designed to streamline stakeholder management processes within a company. Built using the Laravel framework, this application provides a robust and scalable solution for tracking and managing stakeholder interactions, ensuring effective communication and relationship management.

title: Kalender Javascript
description: Interactive calendar with month and year navigation, showcasing days of the month with indicators for Sunday to Saturday. Responsive design ensures accessibility across various devices.

title: Todo List
description: Simple Todo List project is a web application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to create a list of tasks they need to complete. Users can add new tasks, mark tasks as completed, and delete tasks.
